title: En pirandAi manamE
sahitya:
En pirandAi manamE ivvuDalilE


anupallavi

  kAniruTk-kATTinilE kaNNillA shEi pOl ennaik-kavalaikkE ALAkki tivalai arivuminri


caraNam    namban peyarai shonnAl nAttikam pEshuvAi nAshaka vinaikkE nI kAsinai vIsuvAi
tunbap-paDu kuzhiyil tuLLit-tuLLi vizhuvAi shuddha sanmArgam shonnAlO tUngi vizhuvAi
anbuLLa periyArai alaTSiyamAga vaivAi Ashaip-pisAcugaLai AacOpacAram sheivAi
un pazhi bhAvattin tinmai anubhavippAi uLLattai shonnAlO veLLenavE sinappAi
